授業目的: The purpose of this course is to familiarize students with the TOEIC test
到達目標:
Students will be able to choose statements that best describe a picture
Students will be able to understand appropriate responses for simple spoken questions
Students will be able to complete missing questions
授業方法:
Individual work
Information for students permitted to take classes online.
The tests can be taken at home as the audio file can be downloaded and then students can send me their test scores by email. Students taking online classes will be required to meet with the teacher once per week by zoom. The date and time of the meeting will be decided by the teacher and student during Week one by email.

第1回: Students will be given a Reading Homework pack. It will be based on TOEIC Part 7 reading questions. Students must hand it in by the final class.
